title: Video Of Attack On Sufi Shrine Shared As Temple Vandalised In Bangladesh
content: BOOM found that the incident in the viral video is from an attack on a Sufi shrine in Kazipur, Sirajganj, Bangladesh in August 2024.
summary: BOOM found that the incident in the viral video is from an attack on a Sufi shrine in Kazipur, Sirajganj, Bangladesh in August 2024.

title: Deadly Game: US Woman Jailed After Boyfriend Dies In Hide-And-Seek Game
content: A Florida woman received a life sentence after being found guilty of killing her boyfriend by locking him in a suitcase and leaving him to suffocate, amid a background of domestic and alcohol-related issues.
summary: A Florida woman received a life sentence after being found guilty of killing her boyfriend by locking him in a suitcase and leaving him to suffocate, amid a background of domestic and alcohol-related issues.

title: Intel Stands By Forecast After CEO Exit, Vows To Be Thriftier
content: Intel Corp, fresh off the abrupt departure of Chief Executive Officer Pat Gelsinger, stuck with its current financial forecast during a presentation Wednesday while also saying it would keep a tight rein on capital spending.
summary: Intel Corp, fresh off the abrupt departure of Chief Executive Officer Pat Gelsinger, stuck with its current financial forecast during a presentation Wednesday while also saying it would keep a tight rein on capital spending.

title: UK's Keir Starmer Offers 'Plan For Change' To Deliver On Poll Pledges
content: Prime Minister Keir Starmer will unveil a "plan for change" for Britain on Thursday as he attempts a de-facto relaunch of his government following a bumpy first five months in power.

title: Chinese Billionaire's RoyalFlush Trading App Is Big Winner Of Stimulus

title: OpenAI CEO Thinks Elon Musk Won't Use Political Power Against Rivals

title: This Blank 'Pure White' Canvas Expected To Sell For Over $1.5 Million

title: France's Government Ousted In No-Confidence Vote. What Happens Next?
content: The government in France collapsed on Wednesday after lawmakers of both left and right wings joined forces to push a no-confidence against the country's Prime Minister Michel Barnier
summary: The government in France collapsed on Wednesday after lawmakers of both left and right wings joined forces to push a no-confidence against the country's Prime Minister Michel Barnier

title: All About UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson Who Was Shot Dead In US
content: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was shot dead on Wednesday morning in New York. The incident occurred before 7 am at a Manhattan hotel, news agency IANS reported.

title: Earth Aligns Between Sun And Jupiter For Spectacular December 7 Event

title: South Korea President Yoon Suk Yeol Clings To Power After Martial Law U-Turn

title: After French Government Collapses, Lawmakers Call On "Macron To Go"
content: French President Emmanuel Macron on Thursday will seek ways out of France's political crisis, after Michel Barnier became the first prime minister to be ousted by parliament in over six decades.
